sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable no-const-assign */ import { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { MailIcon, PhoneIcon, TrashIcon, PencilIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import ContactContext from '../Context/Contact/contactContext' const ContactItem = ({ contact }) => { const contactContext = useContext(ContactContext) const { deleteContact, setCurrent, clearCurrent } = contactContext const { id, name, email, phone, type, dob, bloodGroup, photo } = contact const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false) // State for expand/collapse const onDelete = () => { deleteContact(id) clearCurrent() } return ( <>
  • setIsExpanded(!isExpanded)} // Toggle expansion on click >

    {name}

    {type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + type.slice(1)}

    {email}

    {isExpanded && ( // Expanded section for extra info

    Phone: {phone}

    Date of Birth: {dob || 'Not provided'}

    Blood Group: {bloodGroup || 'Not provided'}

    )}
    Email
    Call
    { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent item expansion when editing setCurrent(contact); }} className="w-5 h-5 text-gray-100 cursor-pointer" aria-hidden="true" />
    { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent item expansion when deleting onDelete(); }} className="w-5 h-5 text-gray-100 cursor-pointer" aria-hidden="true" />
) } export default ContactItem
